price: (Ragichis) ergamaa Rabbi irraa ta’e kan kitaabota qulqulleeffame dubbisu.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
